summary:
Small collection of armors - MALE and FEMALE
Female version CBBE
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Update[/heading]
v1.5
-added steel armor (male)
-added new version of dbarmor (male)
-added nordplate variant (male)
v1.4
-added daedric armor(female)
-added nordplate (male)
-added various options for deadric, ebony and wolf armor
v1.3
-ebonymail male version added
v1.2
-slight rework for female ebony
-female ebony texture path fixed
-ebonymail armor added (female)
-male ebony neck mesh fixed
v1.1
-fixed shader (plastic/glossy is gone)
-ebony chainmail is now optionail file

[heading]Description[/heading]

I decided to upload a small collection of armors i made for my personal use.
It is not finished yet and i may or may not finish some more armors if i feel motivated^^.
All female models are created for CBBE.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide 2[/url] is supported since i used the CB++ Body from the beginning (note:You will have to tweak the 'Breast Height' slider on some armors in Outfit Studio)
Since the new Bodyslide Tool is very easy to use i recommend you to use it if you want to use the bodyslide feature or Body Type conversions.


What is planned:
-Fixing for Giantcloth
-rework for dragonscale
-dragonbone
-maybe ohter stuff nothing in paticular yet

Works with every texture mod
-exception chainmail texture for female ebony(custom), the cuirass works though

[heading]Important Notes[/heading]
- Female items other than the cuirass you see on the screens are from other mods ( see below)
- I haven't done a .esp for the giantcloth yet so you have to manually rename the files and replace any armor you like

[heading]Installation[/heading]

Install like every other Armor Mod either with NMM or Manually
Optional Files have to be placed Manually

[heading]Recommended Mods[/heading]

[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url]
for boots and gauntles on screenshots:[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and BBP[/url]

[heading]Other Stuff/ Permissions[/heading]

please report any issues, bugs or other stuff you find
feel free to comment and upload images as feedback, suggestions and bad your-mama-jokes are highly appreciated=)
also feel free to do with this mod whatever you like and if you happen to like to add or fix something yourself just contact me.
author: testiger2
